articles.title: Holy Cross dedicates court to Bob Cousy
articles.description:
Bill Simmons and Charlie Baker were in the house Saturday in Worcester.

The post Holy Cross dedicates court to Bob Cousy appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Holy Cross dedicated its basketball court to Boston Celtics legend Bob Cousy on February 8.
Bill Simmons and former Governor Charlie Baker attended the dedication ceremony in Worcester.
The dedication honors Cousy's contributions to basketball and strengthens ties between the community and sports.
